name: Hello, Operator
description:
You're a telephone switchboard operator for a country on the brink of war. You choose who talks to who. Short game a la Papers Please.  

Game ends after a few events - ran out of time to add more!

---

Clicking on a jack creates a cord. Click on another jack to connect the cord between two jacks. To disconnect a cord from a jack, click the jack the cord is connected to.

Connect the jack with flashing lamp to the jack labelled "IN" to start the game.

Press F11 for fullscreen.

--

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021
